Summary: dark grayish approx. 250-300 ft. in diameter 20-30 ft. width at approx. 2500 ft. cloud level
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Fishers

divs: Sighting DetailsPlease visit my web site to view the Nexrad doppler radar images from three states ( Indiana, Kentucky and Tennesee ) I recently purchased the images from the National Climatic Data Center at Ashville, N.C. I believe they are directly related to my observation that same morning. Regards Donald
